dt-api.name: column().responsiveHidden()
dt-api.summary: Get the responsive visibility state of a column in the table

type.description: For the selected column, determine if Responsive has hidden it or not.
type.returns: `true` if the column is responsive visible, `false` otherwise.

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to determine the Responsive visibility state of a single column in a table.
Please note that this is not the same as the column visibility control built into DataTables (`-api columns().visible()` / `-init columns.visible`) - Responsive implements its own column hiding.
